dnl Process this file with: stx2any
w_title(mythryl-ld)dnl
w_doc_id(mythryllddman)dnl
w_section(1)dnl
w_author(Michele Bini)dnl
w_man_desc(Mythryl compiler's linking facility)

! DESCRIPTION

''mythryl-ld'' is invoked by
''build-an-executable-mythryl-heap-image'' to link together .compiled
and .lib.frozen files to produce an heap image file.

! SEE ALSO

''build-an-executable-mythryl-heap-image'' (1),
''mythryl-runtime-intel32'' (1)

! AUTHOR

This page was written by w_author.
